name: Smooch That Dog
description:
*Downloading game recommended. See below for downloads*

SKULL AND MCCORMICK RESEARCH CENTER
--ALERT--

-TEST DOGS HAVE ESCAPED CONTAINMENT

-DOGS ARE EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND WILL ATTACK ON SIGHT

-ALL RESEARCHERS ARE TO EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY 

-IF A DOG APPROACHES YOU, APPLY LOVING KISSES AND PETS 

-FIND ANTIDOTE BLASTERS IF POSSIBLE, THEY WILL CURE DOGS OF THEIR RAGE
-SMOOCHES CHARGED WITH RAGE WILL ALSO CURE DOGS

-AMMUNITION AND MEDICAL KITS ARE HIDDEN IN WALLS IN SECRET CHACHES THROUGHOUT THE FACILITY

-NO DOGS ARE TO BE HARMED FOR ACCOUNTING AND INSURANCE REASONS

-WE THANK YOU FOR COMPLIANCE AND WILLINGNESS TO PUT WORK FIRST

SKULL AND MCCORMICK 
RESEARCH CENTER, LLC
